mapper.select: select NURSE_NO,CERT_NO,ID,PASSWORD,NAME,PHONE,ORIGINALPHOTO,SAVEDPHOTO,TO_CHAR(INPUTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INPUTDATE,TO_CHAR(UPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE,TO_CHAR(DELETEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DELETEDATE,DELETEFLAG from nurse where ID = #{id} and DELETEFLAG='Y'
mapper.update: update NURSE set DELETEFLAG='N' where NURSE_NO=#{nurse_no}
mapper.select: select pt_no , name , room_no , birthdate from patient where nurse_no = #{nurse_no} and DELETEFLAG='Y'

select exercise_no , pt_no , exercisetime , exercisetext from exercise where pt_no = #{pt_no} and today = #{today} and deleteflag = 'Y'

mapper.insert: insert into meal(MEAL_NO, PT_NO, today, TYPEEAT, MEALTIME, WHATEAT) values(MEALNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{typeEat}, #{mealTime}, #{whatEat})
insert into exercise(EXERCISE_NO, PT_NO, today, exercisetext, exercisetime) values(EXERCISENO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{exerciseText}, #{exerciseTime})
insert into dailyCleaning(DAILYCLEANING_NO, PT_NO, today, cleaning, cleaningReport) values(DAILYCLEANINGNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{cleaning}, #{cleaningReport})
insert into dailywash(DAILYWASH_NO, PT_NO, today, wash, washReport) values(DAILYWASH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{wash}, #{washReport})
insert into dailyshower(dailyshower_no, PT_NO, today, shower, showerreport) values(DAILYSHOWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{shower}, #{showerReport})
insert into bedtime(bedtime_no, pt_no, today, timetosleep, timetogetup, report) values(bedtime_seq.nextval, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{timeToSleep}, #{timeToGetup}, #{report})
insert into dr_op(dr_op_no, pt_no, today, reporttime, report) values(dr_op_seq.nextval, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{reportTime}, #{report})
insert into special(special_no, pt_no, today, sreporttime, sreport) values(special_seq.nextval, #{pt_no}, to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{sreportTime}, #{sreport})
